flavorText:
"Push one goblin into sight, an' run a lot. That's tactics."
—Jula, goblin raider

foreignData.name: Ausmanövrieren
foreignData.text: X geblockte Kreaturen Deiner Wahl fügen in diesem Zug ihren Kampfschaden dem verteidigenden Spieler statt den blockenden Kreaturen zu.

name: Outmaneuver
originalText: X target blocked creatures deal combat damage to defending player instead of to blocking creatures this turn.

rulings.text: If a creature is attacking a planeswalker, assigning its damage as though it weren’t blocked means the damage is assigned to the planeswalker, not to the defending player.
Creatures damage the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creatures are no longer there at that time.

text: X target blocked creatures assign their combat damage this turn as though they weren't blocked.
